channel.title: Final Projects on JavaScript
channel.description: Recent content in Final Projects on JavaScript

item.title: Overview & Requirements
item.description: Overview Final Projects are a requirement of “course completion” Project should be something that you are passionate about We’ve established some milestones (and due dates) that will help you stay on track to complete your projects on time Each milestone will include a deliverable Instruction team will actively work with you to help you manage scope and come up with a project plan Requirements For the final project, you’ll be designing and building a web application of your choice.
